preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 100 g of bismuth, 200 g of calcium, 80 g of copper, and 30 g of zinc. 
 2. In a clean, dry mixing container, combine all ingredients thoroughly. 
 3. Use a mechanical stirrer or a high-speed mixer to achieve a homogeneous mixture.
